TextGUIComponent Class Reference

This class is a scriptable GUI component that displays a line of text. More...

#include <text_gui_component.hpp>

Detailed Description

This class is a scriptable GUI component that displays a line of text.

void TextGUIComponent::drawSelf ( bool  reallyDraw,
bool  overlay 
) [protected, virtual]

This method overrides SimpleGUIComponent::drawSelf and sets up the font cache divisor for our shader (the font cache divisor allows the font cache to grow, without invalidating pre-existing string meshes).

void TextGUIComponent::recalculate (  )  [protected]

This method recalculates the text mesh.

After calling this method, the width and height of the component will be correct.
